productInfo.name: Spaceti
productInfo.description: A holistic smart building and workplace app designed to optimize hybrid work environments. It features desk and meeting room booking, parking reservation, indoor navigation, and environmental analytics (air quality/temperature) to improve employee experience and space efficiency.

marketAnalysis.trend: The 'Return to Office' Friction vs. The Hybrid Lifestyle
marketAnalysis.insight: Employees are currently resisting RTO mandates due to the inconvenience. The viral angle isn't 'efficiency' for the company, but 'convenience' and 'wellness' for the user. Framing the app as a tool that guarantees a good seat, fresh air, and zero stress makes the office feel like a high-end coworking space rather than a cubicle farm.

scripts.title: The 'Social Anxiety' Saver
scripts.hook: POV: You walked into a meeting thinking the room was empty... but it wasn't.
scripts.body:
Visual: [0-3s] A person nervously peeking into a glass meeting room, realizing people are in there, and awkwardly speed-walking away. 
Visual: [3-8s] Cut to them pulling out their phone. Close up on Spaceti interface. Tapping 'Book Meeting Room'. The map shows a green (open) room nearby. 
Visual: [8-12s] Person walks confidently to the new room, scans phone at the door, and sits down with a sigh of relief. Text overlay: 'No more guessing.'
scripts.callToAction: Make your office awkward-proof with Spaceti.

scripts.title: Romanticize Your 9-to-5
scripts.hook: Stop sitting in the dark corner of the office. Let's upgrade your view.
scripts.body:
Visual: [0-4s] Aesthetic, high-quality shot of a coffee cup being placed on a desk. Lighting is bad/dim. 
Visual: [4-9s] Screen recording of the Spaceti App. User selects 'Desk Booking', filters for 'Window Seat' or checks the 'Heatmap' to find a quiet zone. 
Visual: [9-13s] Fast transition to a bright, sunlit desk with a great view. User sets up their laptop. Visual of checking 'Air Quality' on the app—it's excellent. 
Audio: Chill Lofi beat.
scripts.callToAction: Book the best seat in the house. Link in bio.

scripts.title: The Parking Wars Solution
scripts.hook: If you drive to work, you know the morning parking panic. Here is how to fix it.
scripts.body:
Visual: [0-3s] Dashboard camera view of a car driving in circles in a parking garage. Text overlay: '7:55 AM - Still looking.' 
Visual: [3-8s] Cut to the night before. Person lying in bed, taps phone. Spaceti App -> 'Reserve Parking Spot #42'. 
Visual: [8-12s] Morning shot: The car drives straight into spot #42. The barrier lifts automatically via license plate recognition (or app scan). 
Visual: [12-15s] Person walks into the office building smiling.
scripts.callToAction: Never fight for a parking spot again. Try Spaceti.
